MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the EH48 postcode area of Bathgate. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:47am. Our emergency response team have now arrived on site to investigate unconfirmed reports of third party damage and will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by midday.  We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:35am on the 6th of November 2020
